4302120.name: They Are Thousands
4302120.description:
They Are Thousands is a single-player, third-person action shooter focused on survival against massive zombie hordes. Set after the collapse of human civilisation, the game challenges players to stay alive while facing overwhelming numbers of infected in fast-paced combat scenarios.

You play as a lone survivor fighting through post-apocalyptic environments that have been completely overrun. With limited space, constant pressure, and no safe zones, every moment is about positioning, movement, and efficient firepower. Zombies attack in dense swarms, forcing players to think tactically rather than shoot everything in sight.

Core Gameplay

The core experience revolves around:

  • Combat against large groups of zombies

  • Real-time third-person shooting with an emphasis on mobility and crowd control

  • Survival-focused encounters, where mistakes are quickly punished

Player Goals & Challenge

Your primary goal is simple: survive as long as possible and eliminate all threats. Each session tests your reaction speed, awareness, and ability to manage overwhelming odds. As the horde grows, players must adapt their movement, aim, and decision-making to avoid being surrounded.

The challenge comes from:

  • Large enemy counts are attacking simultaneously

  • Limited room to retreat

  • Continuous pressure with little downtime

Features

  • Third-Person Shooter Gameplay – Fast, responsive combat designed for intense action

  • Massive Zombie Swarms – Fight against a large number of enemies on screen

  • Survival-Oriented Design – No hand-holding, no safe paths, only skill and reflexes

  • Single-Player Experience – Designed for focused, solo gameplay

Genre

  • Action

  • Third-Person Shooter

  • Survival

They Are Thousands is built for players who enjoy high-pressure combat, overwhelming enemy numbers, and the constant thrill of barely surviving against impossible odds.
